posts.name: Amcintyre
posts.cooked: I received the order email but when I logon and press Add to Cart, the next screen just has a circle going round and round. Have cleared cookies and tried both Chrome and FF but nada.

posts.name: Amcintyre
posts.cooked: After trying more than 1 Ubuntu PC with Chrome and FF, finally switched to a Win11 KVM and got it ordered. Jeez Nvidia, try fixing your marketplace web system.

posts.name: Edward
posts.cooked: Had to go on Safari to place the order. Chrome wasn’t working

posts.name: Geoff Niehaus
posts.cooked: I have tried everything suggested and nothing works. It just sits and spins and I see this console error. framework-37f3832b4337c515.js:1 Uncaught ReferenceError: ClickOmniProd is not defined. Does NVIDIA not want my money???

posts.name: ashreaperone
posts.cooked: I had a smilier problem. Try to use a different browser.

Hi,

We should have a fix in place. Please try again. If you continue to experience issues with marketplace, please reach out to NVIDIA Customer Support Resources so we can assist.

posts.name: Zmroach
posts.cooked: Is there possibly something wrong with order history too? My reserved order isn’t showing up in my account’s order history.
zmroach, please reach out to my colleagues at NVIDIA Customer Support Resources , they should be able to track down your reservation.
